section.title: Example
section.p: To cancel out a certain attribute, specify the exact name:
You can remove (cancel-out, logout) multiple attributes from the session by using <mak:logout actor="attribute name"> several times and/or by using the star (*) wildcard, e.g.:
section.source: <mak:logout actor="demo_*"/> (attributes whose names start with "demo_") <mak:logout actor="*app"/> (attributes whose names end with "app") <mak:logout actor="*"/> (all attributes; this "invalidates" the session)
